name: Mega Final Bumper Mix X 2000 Hyper Turbo Champion + Edition (Yeah that's the name of the game)
name_original: Mega Final Bumper Mix X 2000 Hyper Turbo Champion + Edition (Yeah that's the name of the game)
description:
Run and jump and UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUH

Guys this is a 3d platformer. Like Super Mario 64 but you're racing against YOURSELF (making an AI was too boring).  

5 INTENSE MAP AND THEY'RE ALL DIFFERENT (except sky 1 and 2, they're very similar. Oh and Classic sucks. But hey the 2 other maps are eum...)

INTENSE LEVEL DESIGN if you follow what's written. You can read right ? You learned how to read right ?

BEAUTIFUL GAME if you enjoy the prototype geometry style

INTENSE GAMEPLAY but you're alone and this is really sad 

And comeooooooooon, if you're not convinced, just look at the title and the screenshot dude !

(Btw I made that in 1 mouth, while learning unreal)
